programme.title: True Crime Story

programme.desc: In this true crime story, a beloved town doctor perishes in a deadly house fire -- which investigators conclude was arson; but after securing a murder conviction, the prosecutor doubts his own evidence and joins the fight to free an innocent man.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: Atwater, Ohio
programme.desc: In this true crime story, cold case investigators looking into a double murder elicit a series of confessions from a group of teens; years later, the teens recant their statements; aggressive tactics may have sent an innocent man to death row.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: Turlock, California

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: Royse City, Texas
programme.desc: A couple are found brutally murdered in their home; investigators learn that the last person to see them alive had secrets of his own; some question whether prejudice led police to arrest the wrong man.

programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: Adel, Georgia

programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: Sauquoit, New York

programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: St. Augustine, Florida

programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: Cookeville, Tennessee

programme.desc: A famed aesthetician faces a new challenge when a rival opens a skin care boutique directly across from her store. Suspecting that someone is trying to sabotage her, she embarks on a quest to unravel the mystery of who's trying to destroy her life.

programme.title: Ghostlight
programme.desc: When a construction worker joins a local theater's production of "Romeo and Juliet," the drama onstage starts to mirror his own life.

programme.title: Armand
programme.desc: When Elisabeth is called to a parent-teacher conference after hours, she is presented with scathing allegations that trigger a tangled web of accusations between parents and faculty.

programme.title: Inheritance
programme.desc: When Maya learns that her father was once a spy, she suddenly finds herself at the center of an international conspiracy. In her quest for answers, she must travel the globe, mastering her father's skills and unraveling the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Neighborhood Watch
programme.desc: Believing he witnessed an abduction, a young man turns to his next-door neighbor, a retired security guard, to help him find the missing woman.

programme.title: Sympathy for the Devil
programme.desc: Forced to drive a mysterious passenger at gunpoint, a man finds himself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse where nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: Imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, ex-cop Thomas Malone gets a chance to win his freedom if he can survive a twisted game. Six goons pay for the thrill of hunting Malone for sport on a remote island, but once he arrives, all hell breaks loose.
